messagebundle.msg: Enter the Google Apps Domain name(what comes after the @ mark in your Google Apps mail address):

Turn ON to notify by HTML type.
You must fill in this field
Please enter the user or group mail address to allow them to create new data. Separate by spaces for multiple entry. All users will be able to create new when left blank.
Please enter the user or group mail address to allow them to edit data. Separate by spaces for multiple entry. All users will be able to edit data when left blank.
Please enter the user or group mail address to allow them to delete data. Separate by spaces for multiple entry. All users will be able to delete data when left blank.

The title already exists. Enter a different title.
An error occurred while saving setting
Turn ON to enable the use of Company master.
Turn ON to enable the use of Client master.
Turn ON to enable the use of Case/Opportunity master.
Turn ON to enable the use of Action master.
Select a "Circulation View User/Group" when creating new post to enable the use of group address book pop-up.
To turn ON this function, "Sateraito Office - Group Address Book (Paid ver.)" must be installed.
To turn ON this function, "Sateraito Office - Group Address Book (Free ver.)" must be installed.
You can only use alphabets, numbers, under bar "_", and hyphen "-" to enter as application ID.
The first character must be an alphabet.
Please contact the system administrator for more details.
Turn ON to send notification at the time of data creation/update/deletion.
*The number of data per application would be counted.
Click "Show" to see the number of used records in domain.

The number of data on your domain exceeds limit. Please contact the system administrator.
To expand data limit, please contact Sateraito Office support team.
CLick this link to show User Address/Name edit function.
Starting User Info edit. Are you sure?

Editing User ID. Please edit User ID on Google Apps first.
* Please activate for each application. This may take about an hour to reflect.
*If you are changing both first and family name at once, please enter both.
Failed to start User Info Edit.
Started User Info Edit. This may take some time.
Enter user or group mail address to admit data export to. Separate by spaces for multiple entry. Leave blank to allow all users to export.
Enter user or group mail address to admit data import to. Separate by spaces for multiple entry. Leave blank to allow all users to import.

The "new" mark will be displayed for posts submitted within 24 hours by default,
but by enabling this setting, the mark will be shown for the specified days.
An error occurred when un-reading document

Read documents are displayed in fine characters on the document list. If you wish to change display style, check and configure below. Use HTML color code to set display color(Ex. red, green, #8E2424).
Change display style on Read List
The checked fields will be output to export CSV file.
*You can register print layout. Set by entire HTML.
Turn on to attach file to notification.
Configure below to customize the Creation/Edit/Deletion notification message.
*Enter tag "[$$ (name value) $$]" in subject and body field to embed actual value.
You can only enter alphanumeric value.
Enter area facility code in alphanumeric value : "XXXX-XXX"
Please fill in the required fields.
Failed to attach file: file size too big.
An error occurred while uploading file. Please try again later.

You can not attach empty file.
Comment must be less than 100 characters
Master with the same Master Code already exists
You can only use alphanumeric value , under bars "_", hyphens "-", and periods ".".
Please enter master name in alphanumeric values (ex."shohin_master","shizai_master", etc...).This code will be used to refer in submission template. This code can not be modified later.
Enter a name. Ex. "Product Master","Material Master", etc.
Please enter an original ID item name in Master Data.(Ex.:Product Code)
Enter Master Data Item name.(Ex.Product Name)
Deleting master data. Are you sure?

You can batch update data using CSV files(UTF-8(No BOM)).
Type in first line "IU" to add/update, "I" to add, "U" to update, "D" to delete. Sample CSV file ->

Enter the user or group mail address to allow View. Separate by spaces for multiple entry. All users could access this View when left blank.
Auto Sync User information with Google Apps user
You can set Auto Sync of user information with Google Apps user.
Batch execution will start at configured time, the user registered to Google Apps will be added to User information, and users who do not exist on Google Apps will be deleted from User Information>
Refer to Other Application ID User Information
If you configure to use User Information on Other Application ID, the User Information registered within this Application ID will not be used.
You can configure to use User Information from other Application ID within this Application ID.
User Information was not found within the specified Application ID
The specified Application ID was not found. Please check Application ID spelling.
Create CSV file for all Google Apps Users
Create CSV file for all Google Apps users.
When finished, CSV file Download URL will be sent to
In the CSV file, the registered user data would be included for existing users and a blank line will be included for unregistered users.
Start creating CSV file for all Google Apps Users

Unread documents are shown in bold prints on the document list. You can change the font settings and show them in regular characters or in different colors. Please use HTML color code to change specify colors (Ex. 'Red', 'Green', '#8E2424' etc.)
Modify the display setting for Unread Documents
About Sateraito Office - Cloud CRM Gadgets
Cloud CRM Screen Link Settings Guide for Google Site administrators

By default, [Read more] -> [Sateraito Office - Cloud CRM] will lead to the Gadget introduction page (Current page), but you can set a different destination page, for example Cloud CRM system page, etc.
For more advanced settings, refer to Document Management Manual [Read more -> Sateraito Office - Document Management] Link Destination Modification.
User CRM Gadget allows you to create, edit, delete, and view Company Master, Client Master, Case/Opportunity Master, and Action Master. Please add gadget to Google Site Screen.
*You will need the setting below to synchronize with Google Drive(2014/11/15)
To add gadget to Google Site Page, Read:

Administrator gadget allows you to search and export posts and edit templates. Admin console will also be available in the gadget. Add gadget to Google Site screen and give Access Permission to the page and site itself.(Gadget is inaccessible for regular users)
Install Sateraito Office - CRM Action Extension
Install form the button below! Install will start through Chrome webstore.
*CLick the install button above and [ADD] to install.

*The above button is shown only on Admin screen. To start using this system, the administrator must first click the button above to activate !
Please click again when the admin user has changed his/her mail address!
* The application is already started in your domain. The current administrator email address is:

*The above button is shown only on Admin screen. To start using this system, the administrator must first click the button above to activate !
Please click again when the admin user has changed his/her mail address!
*Invalid format or wrong domain in "Current Mail Address".
*Invalid format or wrong domain in "New Mail Address".
*Only Cloud CRM Administrators could use this gadget.
Contact the system administrators for more.
Sateraito Office - Cloud CRM for Google Apps

<Caution> This is an auto-generated message sent from system address. Please do not reply to this message.
All user CSV file is ready for download. You can start downloading from the URL below.。
This URL will expire in 24 hours.
CSV file is ready for download.
*You may verify directly if application details are shown below.
<Caution> This is an auto-generated message sent from system address. Please do not reply to this message.

Dear %1,
The case/opportunity data below has been %2 to CRM system. Please confirm below.
------------------------------------------------------------------- <>Content Overview<> ------------------------------------------------------------------- Case/Opportunity %3 Author: %4 Created on: %5
------------------------------------------------------------------- Click here to open case/opportunity details in new window.
*You may edit directly if application details are shown below.
<Caution> This is an auto-generated message sent from system address. Please do not reply to this message.

Use a template created by Form layout Builder to edit in Form Layout Builder.\n Editing HTML directly with Form Layout Builder may fracture the form.\n We also advise you to save the content of your current approval route for backup.
*Direct modification of HTML source code will not be reflected to Form Layout Builder.

Turn this setting ON to activate Action Notification Function.

To limit registration to public entry form, specify the IP address of proxy servers from which to allow registration. For multiple registration, list by separating with commas. Ex.) 127.0.0.1,127.0.0.1/32
You have no access rights. Please contact administrator.

Dear [$$ send_to $$],
The below action data has been [$$ action $$] processed to CRM system. Please verify content.
------------------------------------------------------------------- <>Content Overview<> ------------------------------------------------------------------- Action Name: [$$ action_name $$] Author: [$$ create_by_name $$] Created on: [$$ created_date $$]
------------------------------------------------------------------- Action data URL attached below. Please click to open in new window
[$$ link_to_doc_detail $$] *You may verify directly if data content is shown below.
